meanings.sent1: My mam takes care of me every day.
meanings.sent2: The mam bird feeds her chicks with worms.
meanings.sent3: When I fell, my mam kissed my boo-boo to make it better.
meanings.sent4: Her love enveloped me like a warm hug from my mam.
meanings.sent5: The word 'mam' brings to mind warmth, love, and safety.

meanings.sent1: The baby eagerly suckled on her mam for nourishment.
meanings.sent2: She discreetly adjusted her top to nurse her baby on her mam.
meanings.sent3: The kitten kneaded its paws on the soft mam of its mother cat.
meanings.sent4: The ripe fruit was as round and plump as a ripe mam.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of flowers reminded her of the softness of a mam.

meanings.definition: A title of respect for a woman, especially an older woman
meanings.sent1: I greeted the kind mam with a smile and a bow.
meanings.sent2: The villagers sought advice from the wise mam of the community.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child called the elderly lady 'Mam Wisdom'.
meanings.sent4: She was like a beacon of light, earning the title of Mam Grace.
meanings.sent5: Her presence commanded respect, like that of a revered mam.
